Text:
Just to let you know, the cropping is off on this.

It's supposed to be 1.85:1, not 2.35:1.  It says so right on the back of my HD DVD box plus the image just looks smashed from top to bottom.

I'm not trying to bash, but just inform you.

thanks live and learn ,media info gave me that info so i put it in 
sorry thats how the final came out
